Write-Up Text: Australia's social media users are posting diverse opinions on the country's upcoming budget. While some are criticizing past government expenditure such as the $368B allocated for acquiring AUKUS submarines others are calling for budgetary provisions that would benefit veterans and their families. Some people are also concerned about the delay in the completion of Snowy Hydro 2.0 while others are anticipating the introduction of a new national messaging system that would provide natural disaster alerts. Political leaders and their decisions are being scrutinized although some say the budget should focus on a particular issue above all.
